name: SwordMaster
description:
Ludum Dare 45 entry.

My 1st time participating in a game jam.

DISCLAIMER:

Crude language - If it bothers you guys.

STORY:

"""

Play as a master swordsman, entering finally his 1st real dungeon to smite all who stand before him with his mighty sword!!!

At least I hope he does. 

...

Is that his sword here near the couch?

HEY WAIT UP!!!!- Welp he's already locked inside.

.....

Hope it goes well......

"""

Would love to hear feedback (even negative is welcome)!!

`.fbx` models in the game, courtesy of Quaternius!!
